web_snippets: As Mr. Jay, he is the author of numerous bestselling children's books, including Ricky, the Rock that Couldn't Roll and Patrick Picklebottom and the Penny Book.
I'm Mr. Jay, and I have the best career on the planet - I get to spend my days creating amazing characters and writing stories about them.
Mr. Jay Miletsky: Self-publishing is a Business, and Writing is only part of it. ... My name is Jay Miletsky, but I write under the name Mr. Jay.
